attributes.action: Article 50 should not be triggered until debated and approved by Parliament.
attributes.background:
The EU Referendum was non-binding and advisory only.

The UK is a parliamentary democracy.

Therefore the UK should not give notice under Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty until the matter has been debated and approved by Parliament.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
